content.raw: Is the problem happening because the mutex is deleted before the subscriber? I wonder if this fix is safe enough. I think we could at least add a note to the code so that we don't accidentally change the order in the future. Or we could be even more explicit and delete them in order in `~TimePanel`, with a note about the order being important. What do you think?
